title: Magical.Battle.Festa-POSTMORTEM
description:
P O S T M O R T E M
2 0 1 4

presents for nothin but our pleasure

Magical Battle Festa
(c) AGM PLAYISM

Release-Date: 12/14
Protection: Steam
Disc.Count: 1 DVD
Game.Type: Action
Language: EN/JP

G A M E N O T E S

In the near future, humanity has discovered a new
element in their search for renewable energy: Magicore
Using "cauldrons" to refine the element, humans
successfully create magic, and mages are born

All is not well, though. As magic becomes more
widespread, new creatures dubbed 'spectres' begin to
appear. In hopes of training mages to fight spectres and
form an army of Holy Mages, TEOS, the ruling magic
agency, hosts a high stakes tournament: The Magical
Battle Festa

G R O U P N O T E S

We have enough money, beer, girls or whatever at the moment

Besides:

POSTMORTEM will not pre any updates
or patches. Don't like that idea?
* BUY THE GAME! *

G R E E T i N G S

Skid Row, Unleashed
GREENPEACE
0x0007, Genesis

It's just a competition!
Support the Software-Developer
if you like this game!
